feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R715B04
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 26, 03:00 - 04:00 UTC

Nov 14, 17:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 26/11/2024 03:00 UTC
End time : 26/11/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, public network will be temporarily unavailable for servers in rack R715B04.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Thank you for your understanding.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

We are actively working to resolve this problem.

entry.title: [RBX4][Bare Metal] - vRack incident notification - Room 55
entry.content:
Nov 14, 21:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 14/11/2024 19:49 UTC
End time : 14/11/2024 20:34 UTC
Service impact : vRack network was temporarily unavailable for servers in racks 55C18, 55C19, 55B02, 55B03, 55B09, 55B10, 55B11, 55B12, 55C20, 55C21, 55C22, 55C23, 55C24 and 55B06.
Root cause : A hardware issue caused a network equipment in our Datacenter to be temporarily unavailable which caused the incident.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 14, 20:50 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 14/11/2024 19:49 UTC
Service impact : vRack network was temporarily unavailable for servers in racks 55C18, 55C19, 55B02, 55B03, 55B09, 55B10, 55B11, 55B12, 55C20, 55C21, 55C22, 55C23, 55C24 and 55B06.
Since 20:34 UTC, vRack network is available again for all impacted servers.
Root cause : A hardware issue caused a network equipment in our Datacenter to be temporarily unavailable which caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Nov 14, 20:28 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an issue on our network infrastucture. We will update informations when we will have more details.
